channel.title: [508] Serials-Scape High Detail [Web Client Included]
channel.description:
Ok people, here it is a great server with High Detail graphics like Runescape :D
Here it is a list of some features :D:
- 70% GodWars (Not sure, maybe 60-70%) - Minigame "The Great 5"! - Kalphite morphing! - Every npc ingame have the right emotes, except the ones i haven't found! - Commands, teleports and so on. - every modern spell is working, summoning base added! - NPC aggresion, following isn't added! - Npc attack 60% - Player Combat 70% - Special attack for all the godswords, effects on all except Bandos! - All the godwars object working! - ::item command for everyone, item restricted! - Item on Item - Global Objects [b]- High Detail Graphics! - Web Client Included![/b] - Not to easy, not to hard to TRAIN or MAKING CASH! - Alot of special attacks! - Lunar, Modern and Ancient Magicks! - Single pk! - Working Npc update masks! - Bounty hunter - Flames on KBD (A bit bugged) - Fireshield needed (KBD) - CW Base - Jad have all the atks, mage, range and melee. - poisoning!
Now, instructions to play:
1.Download and install cache here: http://www.megaupload.com/?d=WIM2S072
2.Play in: http://192.168.2.4/client.html
3.Enjoy The Game!
Here it goes some images ;):
[IMG]http://i427.photobucket.com/albums/pp352/bruno955/Img1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i427.photobucket.com/albums/pp352/bruno955/Img2.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i427.photobucket.com/albums/pp352/bruno955/Img3.jpg[/img]
Hope You Join :D ________________________
[IMG]http://i427.photobucket.com/albums/pp352/bruno955/Reloader-Sign.gif[/img]

@reloader wrote:

Ok people, here it is a great server with High Detail graphics like Runescape

Here it is a list of some features :D:

  • 70% GodWars (Not sure, maybe 60-70%)
  • Minigame “The Great 5”!

  • Every npc ingame have the right emotes, except the ones i haven’t found!
  • Commands, teleports and so on.
  • every modern spell is working, summoning base added!
  • NPC aggresion, following isn’t added!
  • Npc attack 60%
  • Player Combat 70%
  • Special attack for all the godswords, effects on all except Bandos!
  • All the godwars object working!
  • ::item command for everyone, item restricted!
  • Item on Item
  • Global Objects

  • Not to easy, not to hard to TRAIN or MAKING CASH!
  • Alot of special attacks!
  • Lunar, Modern and Ancient Magicks!
  • Single pk!

  • Bounty hunter
  • Flames on KBD (A bit bugged)
  • Fireshield needed (KBD)
  • CW Base
  • Jad have all the atks, mage, range and melee.
  • poisoning!

Now, instructions to play:

1.Download and install cache here: http://www.megaupload.com/?d=WIM2S072
